name: Gym Or Jail?
description:
You are just a random guy, but not very random, who wants to lose weight and gain some muscles ... but as you already have guessed things don't go the way expected and you get everything except the **** muscles. Unfortunately, the situation gets worse and worse. Your decision is very important.

-GamePlay time: 15-20min
-Genre: Horror, Simulation, Silly, Funny, Adventure.
- Age limit: ask your mom (pegi 99)

WARNING:

 This game contains loud jumpscares (like my past games), flashing lights, drug-associated gameplay (as a joke), blood and violence (not realistic) and addictive stuff (don't sniff it up).

                                                                                                           

This game is the 4th indie horror game I made. Let me know what you think about the game in the comments below, your support will really help me to develop my future games! and please report any bugs or lags. Thank you.

                                               

For Android Users

In ordr to run the game on android you need to connect a keyborad to your phone using OTG cable or a usb-c hub, you can also play the game on chromeOS
